nodes.description: 2020年5月17日凌晨，阿富汗东部洛加尔省Mohammad Agha区的安全检查站遭塔利班武装分子袭击
nodes.support_text: Militants attacks on a security checkpoint in Afghanistan's eastern Logar province left eight security personnel dead on Sunday, provincial government spokesman Didar Ahmad Lawang said.

nodes.description: 袭击造成8名安全人员死亡、5人受伤
nodes.support_text: a group of Taliban insurgents stormed a security checkpoint in Mohammad Agha district in the wee hours of Sunday, killing eight security personnel and wounding five others.

nodes.description: 袭击目标检查站位于Aynak铜矿附近
nodes.support_text: the targeted checkpoint was close to the Aynak copper mine.

nodes.description: 官方未明确伤亡人员具体身份（警察或军队）
nodes.support_text: the official, however, didn't specify if the victims were police or army soldiers, saying the targeted checkpoint was close to the Aynak copper mine.

nodes.description: 截至发稿时，塔利班尚未对事件作出回应
nodes.support_text: Taliban militants have not made comments yet.

edges.support_text: Militants attacks on a security checkpoint in Afghanistan's eastern Logar province left eight security personnel dead on Sunday, provincial government spokesman Didar Ahmad Lawang said.
a group of Taliban insurgents stormed a security checkpoint in Mohammad Agha district in the wee hours of Sunday, killing eight security personnel and wounding five others.
the official, however, didn't specify if the victims were police or army soldiers, saying the targeted checkpoint was close to the Aynak copper mine.
Taliban militants have not made comments yet.
